tasks.title: Software Developer
tasks.description: We are seeking a skilled software developer to join our dynamic team. The ideal candidate will be responsible for designing, coding, and modifying software applications, from layout to function.

tasks.title: Digital Marketing Specialist
tasks.description: Join our marketing team to drive online brand visibility and customer engagement. The Digital Marketing Specialist will be responsible for developing and implementing effective digital marketing strategies across various channels.

tasks.title: Data Scientist
tasks.description: We are looking for a talented data scientist to analyze large datasets, build predictive models, and extract valuable insights. The candidate will play a key role in informing business decisions through data-driven analysis.
